channel.title: Mobile on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: dotnet: How to Build iOS Widgets with .NET MAUI
item.description:
A how-to article showing developers how to build iOS widgets using .NET MAUI, covering creation of widgets ranging from simple static displays to richer interactive experiences.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: github: GitHub Mobile now supports iOS 26 with refined visuals and smoother navigation
item.description:
GitHub Mobile now supports iOS 26, bringing a refined visual language, smoother motion, and tighter system integration to make navigating and creating pull requests feel more natural.

  • Source: GitHub
